name: 鄭智成
objective: This course teaches the numerical solution skills of nonlinear equations, systems of equations, curve fitting, calculus, and differential equations, which are usually required for solving engineering problems. The MATLAB software is used as a platform for the implementation of some numerical methods.
schedule:
week 1: Basic concepts of numerical methods
week 2-3: Introduction to using MATLAB software
week 4-6: Solving a single-variable nonlinear equation
week 7: Optimization
week 8: Solving a system of linear equations
week 9: Midterm exam.
week 10: Solving a system of nonlinear equations
week 11-12: Curve-fitting and interpolation
week 13-14: Numerical differentiation and integration
week 15-16: Numerical solution of ordinary differential equations
week 17: Final exam/report
week 18: Final exam/report
scorePolicy:
Class attendance and involvement --  30%
Midterm exam --  35%
Final exam/report --  35%
materials:
1. ”Applied Numerical Methods with MATLAB for Engineers and Scientists”, Steven C. Chapra, 2nd Eds., McGraw-Hill, 2008.
2. Self-edited course notes
